mapper.insert: insert into qb_temp_wordbank(word, type, grade, phonetic, explain) values(#{word}, #{type}, #{grade}, #{phonetic}, #{explain})
INSERT INTO qb_formal_wordbank ( word, type, grade, phonetic, explain ) SELECT word, type, grade, phonetic, explain FROM qb_temp_wordbank WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT TOP ${pEnd} * FROM ( SELECT qb_temp_wordbank.*, qb_word_type.type_name, row_number () OVER (ORDER BY qb_temp_wordbank.id) n, COUNT (*) OVER () total FROM qb_temp_wordbank INNER JOIN qb_word_type ON qb_temp_wordbank.type = qb_word_type.type WHERE qb_temp_wordbank.type = #{type} ) t1 WHERE t1.n >= #{pStart}
